title: Paramilitary Guard

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to bruise. Reduce their defense by one stage and gain one level of Security.
- At night, you may instead choose to Mow. Tonight, begin revving your gun, informing your visitors of the loud noise. Tomorrow night, select players equal to your Security level (ex: 3 Security, select 3 targets). Shoot at each target's house, rampaging.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the peasants.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
